name: lesson8
description: ``` "ios": {       "supportsTablet": true,       "infoPlist": {         "UIBackgroundModes": [           "location"         ],         "NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription":"App requires location even when the App is backgrounded."       }     },     "android": {       "adaptiveIcon": {         "foregroundImage": "./assets/adaptive-icon.png",         "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF"       },       "permissions":["ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION","ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION","ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION"]     },
